gobblin.runtime.embedded

Class EmbeddedGobblin

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.embedded.EmbeddedGobblin

  • public class EmbeddedGobblin
extends Object
    A class used to run an embedded version of Gobblin. This class is only intended for running a single Gobblin job. If a large number of Gobblin jobs will be launched, use a GobblinInstanceDriver instead. Usage: new EmbeddedGobblin("jobName").setTemplate(myTemplate).setConfiguration("key","value").run();

      • distributeJarByClassWithPriority

        public EmbeddedGobblin distributeJarByClassWithPriority(Class<?> klazz,
                                                        int priority)
        Specify that the input jar should be added to workers' classpath on distributed mode. Jars with lower priority value will appear first in the classpath. Default priority is 0.

      • distributeJarWithPriority

        public EmbeddedGobblin distributeJarWithPriority(String jarPath,
                                                 int priority)
        Specify that the input jar should be added to workers' classpath on distributed mode. Jars with lower priority value will appear first in the classpath. Default priority is 0.

      • getDefaultSysConfig

        protected Config getDefaultSysConfig()
        This is the base Config used for the job, containing all default configurations. Subclasses can override default configurations (for example setting a particular JobLauncherFactory.JobLauncherType.

      • run

        public JobExecutionResult run()
                       throws InterruptedException,
                              TimeoutException,
                              ExecutionException
        Run the Gobblin job. This call will block until the job is done.
        Returns:
        a JobExecutionResult containing the result of the execution.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        TimeoutException
        ExecutionException

      • runAsync

        public JobExecutionDriver runAsync()
                            throws TimeoutException,
                                   InterruptedException
        Launch the Gobblin job asynchronously. This method will return when the Gobblin job has started.
        Returns:
        a JobExecutionDriver. This object is a future that will resolve when the Gobblin job finishes.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the Gobblin job does not start within the launch timeout.
        InterruptedException
